What is the name of the online dice roller in which you give all of your players the link and everyone is in &quot;the same room&quot; for their rolls?<br /><br />I have a link to it on my home computer but not here at work and I CANNOT think of what it&#39;s called!

      <p><cite>2018-06-13 16:10:55 (edited: 2018-06-13 16:10:55)</cite></p>
        <p>I know this one <a href="https://rolz.org/join" class="ot-anchor">https://rolz.org/join</a><br /><br /><a href="https://rolz.org/join" data-embed="CNECCNACCM8CCAASFWh0dHBzOi8vcm9sei5vcmcvam9pbjo1COGEqM-_" data-attachment-render-hint="1" class="ot-anchor">https://rolz.org/join</a></p>
</div>
